title: attempted fix for crash in PoemPresenter.isFavorite
message:
attempted fix for crash in PoemPresenter.isFavorite

PoemPresenter.isFavorite should never be reached without selectedPoem being set in attachView, which is called in PoemActivity.onCreate. It still happened several times though...

This might have something to do with the issue mentioned here:
https://github.com/JakeWharton/ActionBarSherlock/issues/459
 i.e. onCreateOptionsMenu is called after finish() (when we determined that the poems haven't been loaded yet and go back to MainActivity). If this is the case just returning false should fix it.

title: Bugfix for crash when closing one of several MainActivity instances
message:
Bugfix for crash when closing one of several MainActivity instances

Problem was that presenter.detachView was called without another call to presenter.attachView. Now this is handled in onPause / onResume.

This still means that there can effectively be only one instance of MainActivity (state is global) but that seems reasonable enough for all usecases I can think of.

title: Don't cancel completed Downloads!!
